description: Yep, Mr. Hex is the mascot of the 1970s Clean Climbing revolution. Mr. H is screen-printed on a tee made of 100% organic cotton fabric. Because this T-shirt is made with organic cotton fabric, it uses 84% less water and creates 16% less CO2 than a conventional cotton T-shirt. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.
name: Patagonia Mr. Hex Organic T-Shirt - Mens
